track.name: Popular (with Playboi Carti & Madonna) - Music from the HBO Original Series

wiki.summary: "Popular" is a song by The Weeknd, Playboi Carti and Madonna. It was released as a single for the HBO original series The Idol. The track explores the desire for fame and the lengths some people will go to in order to achieve it. The lyrics depict a woman who craves popularity and is willing to do whatever it takes to be in the spotlight. Read more on Last.fm.
